hadiths.text: Abu Rafi' reported:I testify that I used to roast the liver of the goat for the Messenger of Allah (may peace be tipcn him) and then he offered praver but did not perform ablution

chapter.ara-name: باب نَسْخِ " الْوُضُوءِ مِمَّا مَسَّتِ النَّارُ "
chapter.eng-name: Abrogation of wudu’ for that which has been touched by fire
